item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is the content of this post. Here is some displayed math: \begin{equation} X^\mathfrak{b} = \mathrm{Ad}_{\mathfrak{b} \leftarrow \mathfrak{a}} X^a. \end{equation} Here is some inline math: Transformations in a group \(G\) can be expressed as changes of frame \(\mathfrak b \leftarrow a\).
